full_summary:
**Vocational Training - First Aid and CPR Training (Ontario Region)**

**Request for Standing Offer**

**Tender ID:** PW-22-01004105
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 21C40-22-3964030
**Publication Date:** 2022-08-12
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-08-31T14:00:00

**Description:**

The Correctional Service of Canada, CORCAN, Region of Ontario, is seeking a contractor to provide third-party certification in First Aid and Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CPR) Adult with Automated External Defibrillator (AED) training courses to groups of offenders at Federal Institutions in the Ontario region.

The contractor will be required to provide:

* Sufficient resources (instructors) to facilitate First Aid, CPR Adult, and AED training at each institution for which the contractor has been identified to provide services
* Training materials, written, practical exercises, and testing as required for the completion of the applicable course
* All necessary materials, including manuals, handouts, Personal Protective Equipment (PPE), and any other necessary equipment, including cleaning supplies for equipment
* Delivery of all materials/equipment to the location prior to the start of the course
* A list of successful participants to the Project Officer
* Hard copy of certificates for successful participants within 14 days of course completion, delivered to the Project Officer

**Key Requirements:**

* Contractor must provide services in English
* Multiple Standing Offers are expected, with a minimum of four (4) Standing Offers, one (1) per stream (see Annex A – Statement of Work for details)
* Estimated volume of sessions per stream is specified in Annex A – Statement of Work
* Services are to be performed during the period of October 1, 2022 to September 30, 2023, with an option to renew for two (2) additional one-year periods

**Additional Information:**

* Bidders can obtain the complete statement of work and evaluation criteria by downloading the solicitation document and associated documents from Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French)
